list.name: Default
list.comment:
Added fresh ass background that I Photoshopped. Create a Draw class to make drawing standard things easier. Will be adding all kinds of stuff to that at some point.
Added a TextDrawingOptions object, to standardize the process of drawing text to the Canvas. SplashView loads background and shows loading.
Next step: Create a class to standardize loading. Supply what elements must be loaded, and this class should know where to put them (like which caches). I still need to evaluate the different file-types that this project will need.
Next next step: Work on a way to move between views. A call to "GameWindow" to switch Controllers should be the way to go.

task.summary: Added custom Font. Updated background with "scaled background" option
Updated main window to refresh 60 times per second. Drawing now occurs on a canvas. Canvas calls paint method of views.

Added fresh ass background that I Photoshopped. Create a Draw class to make drawing standard things easier. Will be adding all kinds of stuff to that at some point.
Added a TextDrawingOptions object, to standardize the process of drawing text to the Canvas. SplashView loads background and shows loading.
Next step: Create a class to standardize loading. Supply what elements must be loaded, and this class should know where to put them (like which caches). I still need to evaluate the different file-types that this project will need.
Next next step: Work on a way to move between views. A call to "GameWindow" to switch Controllers should be the way to go.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Added fresh ass background that I Photoshopped. Create a Draw class to make drawing standard things easier. Will be adding all kinds of stuff to that at some point.
Added a TextDrawingOptions object, to standardize the process of drawing text to the Canvas. SplashView loads background and shows loading.
Next step: Create a class to standardize loading. Supply what elements must be loaded, and this class should know where to put them (like which caches). I still need to evaluate the different file-types that this project will need.
Next next step: Work on a way to move between views. A call to "GameWindow" to switch Controllers should be the way to go.
